name: Ether Drought
description:
A colony of little vampires has been living well for generations upon the Moonlit Isle, a paradise where the sun never rises. Recently, a young sun goddess has discovered the isle, and seeks to claim it as a site for her first temple.  Luckily the moon is your patron. 

With the power of a mystical plant called Ether, the Lady of the Moon can stave of the encroaching daylight. Send your people across the land to collect Ether from nearby farms. If you can procure enough extra Ether, she will accept some in exchange for additional boons. Be careful though, if you ever run out, nothing will stop the deadly dawn.

Controls:
- Hold Left Click & Drag to select vampires
- With vampires selected, Right Click a location to send them there
- Send vampires to farms to collect Ether
- Click the Moon Goddess to spend Ether for Boon Cards

A Jelly Fountain Game:
- Wyatt Senalik (Lead Programmer)
- Eslis Vang (UI Programmer)
- Bryce Cernohous-Schrader (Gameplay Programmer)
- Sam Smith (Environment & Gameplay Artist)
- Sunny Hanna (Character & Menu Artist)

Sound Credits:
"Ambience, Night Wildlife, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org
